about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Passion for capturing life's beautiful moments

story.title: Our Story
story.content: With over 10 years of experience in photography, we have dedicated our work to capturing the moments that matter most. Our passion for storytelling through images drives us to create timeless memories for our clients.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: We believe in capturing authentic moments and genuine emotion. Our approach blends artistic vision with technical expertise to deliver images that tell your unique story.
